Package org.blockchainnative.builder

Class ContractInfoBuilder<TSelf extends ContractInfoBuilder<TSelf,TContractType,TContractInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder,TMethodInfo,TEventInfoBuilder,TEventInfo>,TContractType,TContractInfo extends ContractInfo<TContractType,TMethodInfo,TEventInfo>,TMethodInfoBuilder extends MethodInfoBuilder,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo,TEventInfoBuilder extends EventInfoBuilder,TEventInfo extends EventInfo<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.builder.ContractInfoBuilder<TSelf,TContractType,TContractInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder,TMethodInfo,TEventInfoBuilder,TEventInfo>
  • Type Parameters:
    TSelf - Concrete type of the ContractInfoBuilder
    TContractType - Java interface type representing the smart contract
    TContractInfo - Concrete type of the ContractInfo to be created
    TMethodInfoBuilder - Concrete type of the MethodInfoBuilder used by this builder
    TMethodInfo - Concrete type of the MethodInfo objects used by ContractInfo
    TEventInfoBuilder - Concrete type of the EventInfoBuilder by this builder
    TEventInfo - Concrete type of the EventInfo objects used by ContractInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthereumContractInfoBuilder, FabricContractInfoBuilder
    public abstract class ContractInfoBuilder<TSelf extends ContractInfoBuilder<TSelf,TContractType,TContractInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder,TMethodInfo,TEventInfoBuilder,TEventInfo>,TContractType,TContractInfo extends ContractInfo<TContractType,TMethodInfo,TEventInfo>,TMethodInfoBuilder extends MethodInfoBuilder,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo,TEventInfoBuilder extends EventInfoBuilder,TEventInfo extends EventInfo<?,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API to build ContractInfo objects.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractInfo, MethodInfoBuilder, ParameterInfoBuilder, EventInfoBuilder, EventParameterInfoBuilder, EventFieldInfoBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ContractInfoBuilder​(java.lang.Class<TContractType> contractType)
      Initializes a new ContractInfoBuilder for the given contractType and creates builders for each method annotated with ContractMethod and ContractEvent.

      • ContractInfoBuilder

        public ContractInfoBuilder​(java.lang.Class<TContractType> contractType)
        Initializes a new ContractInfoBuilder for the given contractType and creates builders for each method annotated with ContractMethod and ContractEvent.
        Parameters:
        contractType - Java interface representing the smart contract

    • Method Detail

      • withIdentifier

        public TSelf withIdentifier​(java.lang.String identifier)
        Sets the identifier of the ContractInfo.
        Initial value is taken from SmartContract.value() If no identifier is set when build() is called, a random id will be generated.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier to be used
        Returns:
        ContractInfoBuilder

      • method

        public TMethodInfoBuilder method​(java.lang.String methodName,
                                 java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Creates or returns a preexisting MethodInfoBuilder for a method of the smart contract interface.
        Parameters:
        methodName - name of the method
        parameterTypes - types of the method parameters
        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder for the specified method

      • ensureMethodBelongsToContractType

        protected java.lang.reflect.Method ensureMethodBelongsToContractType​(java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                     java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Ensures that a specified method is declared on the smart contract interface (or one of its super types)
        Parameters:
        methodName - name of the method
        parameterTypes - types of the method parameters
        Returns:
        Method object representing the defined method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the method could not be found on the smart contract interface type.

        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder for the specified method

      • getRandomId

        protected static java.lang.String getRandomId()
        Creates a random identifier using UUID.randomUUID()
        Returns:
        random identifier

      • self

        protected TSelf self()
        Returns itself as the generic parameter TSelf.
        Allows sub types of ContractInfoBuilder to return the correct type from the fluent methods like withIdentifier(String).
        Returns:
        this casted to TSelf

      • build

        public final TContractInfo build()
        Creates the ContractInfo object declared through the fluent API.
        Must only be called once.
        Returns:
        ContractInfo object represented by the builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case the build() has been called before.

      • builderForMethodInternal

        protected abstract TMethodInfoBuilder builderForMethodInternal​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Creates and initializes a new MethodInfoBuilder for the given method.
        Parameters:
        method - method of the smart contract interface
        Returns:
        new MethodInfoBuilder for the given method.

        Returns:
        new EventInfoBuilder for the given event method.
